name: TheAtlantic
text: “I hear the door close. I turn around. And he’s right at me, pushing me against the wall.” The journalist @Tashka9 says she was assaulted by Donald Trump during a 2005 interview at Mar-a-Lago. This is her story: https://t.co/RWK8lcKXfb

name: TheAtlantic
text: Dozens of women have accused Donald Trump of ogling, grabbing, groping, mauling, or raping them. Who are they? Why did they decide to tell their stories, and what has life been like since? Read the first installment of our new series: https://t.co/66iE8ldt5w

name: TheAtlantic
text: For the first time since the pandemic's early days in the U.S., a new movie has opened in theaters nationwide. Unfortunately, it's not a very good one—but it's the best Hollywood can do now as cinemas slowly reopen, @davidlsims writes. https://t.co/e5KTT6kfbA
